TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ToolStripRenderer extends System.Object

summary.span: 處理 物件的繪製功能。

span.span: Handles the painting functionality for objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用類別套用特定樣式或佈景主題到。Use the class to apply a particular style or theme to a . 而不是自訂繪製和它所包含的物件，設定屬性的物件，繼承自。Rather than custom painting a and the objects it contains, you set the property to an object that inherits from . 繪製由指定套用至，以及它所包含的項目。The painting specified by the is applied to the , as well as the items it contains. 您可以在中執行自訂繪製數種方式的控制項。You can do custom painting in controls in several ways. 如同其他 Windows Form 控制項，和都具有可覆寫`OnPaint`方法和`Paint`事件。As with other Windows Forms controls, the and both have overridable `OnPaint` methods and `Paint` events. 規則的繪製，座標系統是控制項的相對於用戶端區域。也就是控制項的左上角為 0，0。As with regular painting, the coordinate system is relative to the client area of the control; that is, the upper left-hand corner of the control is 0, 0. `Paint`事件和`OnPaint`方法行為與其他控制項的繪製事件一樣。The `Paint` event and `OnPaint` method for a behave like other control paint events. 類別具有可覆寫的方法來繪製背景、 項目背景、 項目影像、 項目箭號、 項目文字和框線。The class has overridable methods for painting the background, item background, item image, item arrow, item text, and border of the . 這些方法的事件引數會公開數個屬性，例如矩形、 色彩和文字格式，您可以視需要進行調整。The event arguments for these methods expose several properties such as rectangles, colors, and text formats that you can adjust as desired. 若要調整幾個層面的項目繪製的方式，您通常會覆寫。To adjust just a few aspects of how an item is painted, you typically override the . 如果您要撰寫新的項目，且想要控制繪製的所有層面，覆寫`OnPaint`方法。If you are writing a new item and want to control all aspects of the painting, override the `OnPaint` method. 從`OnPaint`，您可以使用從方法。From within `OnPaint`, you can use methods from the . 根據預設，為雙重緩衝，利用設定。By default, the is double buffered, taking advantage of the setting. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作自訂 類別。The following code example demonstrates how to implement a custom class. `GridStripRenderer`類別自訂的三個層面`GridStrip`控制項的外觀：`GridStrip`框線，框線和映像。The `GridStripRenderer` class customizes three aspects of the `GridStrip` control's appearance: `GridStrip` border, border, and image. 如需完整的程式碼清單，請參閱[How to： 實作自訂的 ToolStripRenderer](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-implement-a-custom-toolstriprenderer.md)。For a full code listing, see [How to: Implement a Custom ToolStripRenderer](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-implement-a-custom-toolstriprenderer.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GridStrip#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GridStrip/CS/GridStrip.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GridStrip#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GridStrip/VB/GridStrip.vb#10)]
